id: [Resources for Artists] Folder Icon Set for Windows/Notion - Solarized Palette
name: [Resources for Artists] Folder Icon Set for Windows/Notion - Solarized Palette
description: Hello!If you want to have your Notion dashboard or Windows folders organized in a colors based on the Solarized Palette, well, you're in luck!These folders are meant to be used on Windows or anything you like, really. It's a great way to organize your folders with some color and keep everything very tidy. There is a small comparison from before and after the customization in both light and dark mode on the banner, so you can see how it looks like on Windows!This is a Free Resource! It is not mea
features: (16) Icons in both .ICO and .PNG formats, 448x320px; A ReadMe file containing instructions and important information (Please read!)
